clauses.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.
clauses.clause_text: There's no other mention of logs in the Privacy Policy

case.text: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
UptimeRobot reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any part of this Agreement.
It is your responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: Please keep in mind that we may continue to retain your information after closing your account, as described in Information We Collect above–for example, when that information is reasonably needed to comply with (or demonstrate our compliance with) legal obligations such as law enforcement requests, or reasonably needed for our legitimate business interests.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text:
UptimeRobot uses the following products/services (which are all GDPR compliant):

  • Limestone Networks: for sending monitoring requests and storing data.
  • Amazon Web Services: for sending monitoring requests and storing data.
  • Digital Ocean: for sending monitoring requests and storing data.
  • Nexmo: for sending SMS and voice notifications.
  • 2Checkout: for credit card payments.
  • PayPal: for PayPal and credit card payments.
  • Google Analytics: for analyzing the browsing behavior of our users and visitors.
  • Google Fonts: for loading a custom fonts.
  • Rollbar: for loggin errors and bugs.
  • Google Ads: for auto-pausing Google ads during downtimes.
  • Facebook Ads: for auto-pausing Facebook ads during downtimes.

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: To communicate with you, for example through an email, about offers and promotions offered by UptimeRobot and others we think will be of interest to you

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text:
Pixel tags (also called web beacons) are small blocks of code placed on websites and emails.
UptimeRobot uses cookies and other technologies like pixel tags

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: In connection with any merger, sale of company assets, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company, or in the unlikely event that UptimeRobot goes out of business or enters bankruptcy, user information would likely be one of the assets that is transferred or acquired by a third party.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share information about you with third party vendors who need to know information about you in order to provide their services to us, or to provide their services to you.
This group includes vendors that help us provide our Services to you (like payment providers that process your credit and debit card information, fraud prevention services that allow us to analyze fraudulent payment transactions, SMS and email delivery services that help us stay in touch with you), those that assist us with our marketing efforts (e.g.
by providing tools for identifying a specific marketing target group or improving our marketing campaigns), those that help us understand and enhance our Services (like analytics providers) who may need information about you in order to, for example, provide technical or other support services to you.

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may disclose information about you to our subsidiaries, our employees, and individuals who are our independent contractors that need to know the information in order to help us provide our Services or to process the information on our behalf.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: To measure, gauge, and improve the effectiveness of our advertising, and better understand user retention and attrition–for example, we may analyze how many individuals purchased a plan after receiving a marketing message or the features used by those who continue to use our Services after a certain length of time;

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Because UptimeRobot’s Services are offered worldwide, the information about you that we process when you use the Services in the EU may be used, stored, and/or accessed by individuals operating outside the European Economic Area (EEA) who work for us, other members of our group of companies, or third party data processors.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
Other parties may also provide analytics services via our Services.
These analytics providers may set tracking technologies (like cookies) to collect information about your use of our Services

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: as well as track and understand email campaign effectiveness.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: And, we will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law (such as tax, accounting or other legal requirements).

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can usually access, correct, or delete your personal data using your account settings and tools that we offer, but if you aren’t able to do that, or you would like to contact us about one of the other rights, scroll down to How to Reach Us

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: Change log:

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or needs to transfer personal data after a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale of the services, the data will still be processed in a manner that honours the promises made in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text: If any of these events were to happen, this Privacy Policy would continue to apply to your information and the party receiving your information may continue to use your information, but only consistent with this Privacy Policy.

case.text: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

clauses.title: Two factor authentication is provided for your account
clauses.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.
clauses.clause_text: To enhance the security of your account, we encourage you to enable our advanced security settings, like Two Step Authentication.

case.text: Two factor authentication is provided for your account

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell our users’ private personal information.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: We require our subsidiaries, employees, and independent contractors to follow this Privacy Policy for personal information that we share with them.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You may opt out of receiving promotional messages from us. Just follow the instructions in those messages. If you opt out of promotional messages, we may still send you other messages, like those about your account, monitoring alerts and legal notices.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: If you have an account on the products, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We may share information that has been aggregated or reasonably de-identified, so that the information could not reasonably be used to identify you. For instance, we may publish aggregate statistics about the use of our Services.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: At this time, UptimeRobot does not respond to “do not track” signals across all of our Services.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Location Information: We may determine the approximate location of your device from your IP address.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
